text:
On Linux x86_64, glibc I'm getting the following error during the compilation natively (and cross compilation)

`Amd requested but AMD library not found or doesn't contain amd_valid`

`Is there any binary dependency I can download?`

text: No idea what "amd library" concretely is. You may want to provide some more context

text:
Oops I jumped to conclusions that it meant AMD chip related libraries:see_no_evil:
Now I rechecked it must be something with SuiteSparce.  (Which has a I'll repo) My bad. It must get resolved now
